{"aid": "http://arxiv.org/abs/2504.21576v1", "title": "Marcinkiewicz-type laws of large numbers for pseudo-independent random
  variables under sublinear expectations", "summary": "As a kind of independence of random variables under sublinear expectations,
pseudo-independence is weaker than Peng's independence. We shall give
Marcinkiewicz-type weak and strong laws of large numbers for pseudo-independent
random variables under the framework of sublinear expectations.", "main_category": "math.PR", "categories": "math.PR", "published": "2025-04-30T12:27:35Z"}
